content: this basic book sleeve is made up entirely of double crochets and single crochets with a mesh detailing at the top for the drawstring to fit gauge for this is not terribly important and the stitch pattern does allow for some stretch a standard a5 book is meant to fit however due to the strecth it could fit something slightly bigger you will need roughly 100g of dk weight cotton and a 4 5mm hook scissors to cut the yarn stitch markers are optional
